metadata.title: CVE-2017-8373 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The mad_layer_III function in layer3.c in Underbit MAD libmad 0.15.1ballows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based bufferoverflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8373` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmad0 - 0.15.1b-9ubuntu18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmad package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.1b-9ubuntu18.04.1').
